ToolDescription: AI Design Tool for Branded Content. You can use it to generate great product photos for your advertisements or other content.
ToolShortDescription: AI Design Tool for creating branded product photos for ads/content.

ToolDescription:
Audiobooks narrated by a text-to-speech AI are now available via Apple’s Books. 
Initially only available for romance and fiction books, where they list two available digital voices: Madison and Jackson.
ToolShortDescription: AI-narrated audiobooks now available on Apple Books

ToolDescription: NeevaAI provides authentic, real-time AI search. It combines the power of AI with a search stack to give you fast, accurate, and up-to-date results. And, it provides sources where the information was pulled from.
ToolShortDescription: AI-powered search with real-time, accurate results and source info.

ToolDescription: Shuffll is a cutting-edge video production platform that uses AI technology to streamline the creation process. Our platform allows businesses to easily create high-quality, personalized video content in a fraction of the time it would take using traditional methods.
ToolShortDescription: AI-powered video production platform for fast, personalized content creation.

ToolDescription: Combine Free Live Chat with Open-Source Chatbots to boost ROI. Integrate Chatbots with WhatsApp or other channels to have one inbox for all communications.
ToolShortDescription: Combine Chatbots & Live Chat for boosted ROI, one inbox for all channels.

ToolDescription: Krisp’s AI-powered solution removes background noise and echo from meetings, leaving only human voice. Has features like noise & echo cancellation, widget, insights and call summary.
ToolShortDescription: Krisp's AI removes background noise & echo from meetings

ToolDescription: Amazon CodeWhisperer is a machine learning (ML)–powered service that helps improve developer productivity by generating code recommendations based on their comments in natural language and code in the integrated development environment (IDE).
ToolShortDescription: Write code faster with ML-powered code recommendations.

ToolDescription: Get unstuck in your academic problems like Science, Math, Literature, Social Studies and more with help from Google's AI and also get visual explanations of important concepts in each subject.
ToolShortDescription: Get unstuck in academics with Google's AI and visual explanations.

ToolDescription: A new way to explore ideas and discover books. Make a statement or ask a question to browse passages from books using experimental AI.
